div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Vol. 49, Wk. of July 3, 1915. p.715.

body.p: Joseph Freudenthal, 70 years old, died at his residence 5539 Blackstone ave. The deceased was a pioneer furniture manufacturer.
He had been in the furniture business for the last forty years, and, for more than twenty years, had been owner and manager of the Royal Furniture and Carpet Co.
Mr. Freudenthal was a member of the Standard and Ravisloe Country Clubs.
